welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lower Swatara, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Harrisburg International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Harrisburg International Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Capital City Airport serves as the gateway for international flights and offers duty-free shopping and currency exchange services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Capital City Airport caters to private and corporate jets, providing exclusive amenities and services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
